statements: SELECT * FROM basketball_player WHERE position = 'PG';
SELECT id, name, height FROM basketball_player ORDER BY height DESC;
SELECT name, weight FROM basketball_player WHERE weight > 200;
SELECT * FROM basketball_player ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, position FROM basketball_player WHERE height < 6.5;
SELECT * FROM basketball_player WHERE position = 'Guard' ORDER BY height DESC, weight ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, position FROM basketball_player WHERE height > 200 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, height, weight FROM basketball_player WHERE position = 'Forward' ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT * FROM basketball_player WHERE weight >= 200 AND position IN ('Center', 'Power Forward') ORDER BY height ASC, weight DESC;
SELECT id, name, position FROM basketball_player WHERE weight < 180 OR height < 190 ORDER BY name DESC, height ASC;
SELECT * FROM players LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_id, name, position FROM players WHERE position='Forward';
SELECT team_name, city FROM teams ORDER BY city ASC;
SELECT player_id, name, height, weight FROM players WHERE height > 6 ORDER BY height DESC;
SELECT coach, team_name FROM teams WHERE coach='John Smith';
SELECT name, height, weight FROM players WHERE position = 'Forward';
SELECT player_id, name, height, weight, position FROM players WHERE height > 6.0 AND position = 'Center' ORDER BY height DESC;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE weight BETWEEN 180 AND 200 ORDER BY weight ASC, height DESC;
SELECT team_name, city, coach FROM teams WHERE coach = 'John Smith';
SELECT player_id, name, height, weight, position FROM players WHERE position IN ('Guard', 'Forward') ORDER BY player_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE height > 200
SELECT name, position FROM players ORDER BY name
SELECT player_id, height, weight FROM players WHERE weight >= 80 ORDER BY height DESC
SELECT team_name, city, coach FROM teams WHERE city = 'Los Angeles'
SELECT player_id, points, assists FROM player_stats WHERE assists > 50 ORDER BY points DESC
SELECT * FROM teams
SELECT team_name, city FROM teams ORDER BY city
SELECT player_id, name, position FROM players WHERE position='Guard'
SELECT player_id, name, height, weight, position FROM players WHERE height >= 200
SELECT team_name, coach, COUNT(*) AS total_players FROM teams JOIN players ON teams.team_id = players.player_id GROUP BY team_name, coach
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_id, name, position FROM players WHERE position = 'Forward';
SELECT team_name, COUNT(player_id) AS player_count FROM teams JOIN players ON teams.team_id = players.player_id GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT player_id, name, points_scored FROM players JOIN player_stats ON players.player_id = player_stats.player_id ORDER BY points_scored DESC;
SELECT match_id, team1_id, team2_id, match_date FROM matches WHERE match_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, height, weight FROM players WHERE height > 180 ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT players.name, player_stats.matches_played, player_stats.points_scored FROM players INNER JOIN player_stats ON players.player_id = player_stats.player_id WHERE player_stats.points_scored > 50;
SELECT matches.match_date, teams.team_name AS team1, (SELECT team_name FROM teams WHERE teams.team_id = matches.team2_id) AS team2 FROM matches INNER JOIN teams ON matches.team1_id = teams.team_id;
SELECT player_id, name, position FROM players WHERE position = 'Forward' AND height > 190 ORDER BY name ASC;

SELECT player_stats.player_id, players.name, player_stats.assists FROM player_stats INNER JOIN players ON player_stats.player_id = players.player_id WHERE player_stats.assists > 10 ORDER BY player_stats.assists DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_position FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_height, player_weight FROM players WHERE player_position = 'Guard';
SELECT team_name, team_city FROM teams ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT coach_name, years_experience FROM coaches WHERE years_experience > 5;
SELECT player_name, points_scored, assists, rebounds FROM player_stats WHERE points_scored > 20;
SELECT player_name, player_position FROM players WHERE player_height > 200;
SELECT team_name, team_city FROM teams WHERE team_established < 2000;
SELECT player_name, player_position, points_scored FROM players INNER JOIN player_stats ON players.player_id = player_stats.player_id;
SELECT game_date, home_team_id, home_team_score, away_team_id, away_team_score FROM games ORDER BY game_date DESC;
SELECT coach_name, years_experience FROM coaches JOIN teams ON coaches.team_id = teams.team_id WHERE team_city = 'Los Angeles';
